title: Research Topic: Glass-Steagall Erosion Campaign
summary: Based on the research priority 'Glass-Steagall Erosion Campaign', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Track banking lobby pressure campaign to erode and eventually repeal Glass-Steagall Act... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
